Source.Name: perl-pod-usage
Source.Summary: Pod::Usage - extracts POD documentation and shows usage information
Source.Description: Extracts POD documentation and shows usage information. pod2usage should be given either a single argument, or a list of arguments corresponding to an associative array (a "hash").

Package.Name: perl-pod-usage
Package.Summary: Pod::Usage - extracts POD documentation and shows usage information
Package.Description: Extracts POD documentation and shows usage information. pod2usage should be given either a single argument, or a list of arguments corresponding to an associative array (a "hash").
